mng: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning, north Hebei, the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436), surname Yan
swallow (family Hirundinidae), old variant of 宴[yan4]

exm.mng: Yan mountain range across north Hebei
Yan and Zhao, two of the Warring States in Hebei and Shanxi, beautiful women, women dancers and singers
Yanjing, an old name for Beijing, capital of Yan at different periods
